page.title: 04Housing, Bridgham
page.content:
There are 107 properties in the village, displaying a wide range of building materials, from a traditional thatched cottage, examples of local flint construction and clay lump to the modern brick. Styles are equally varied: modernised old properties, purpose built bungalows for the retired, a converted school, etc. Houses lie along the road (C148), known as The Street, with two small enclaves branching on either side of the High Bridgham road.
Ownership patterns, as showed by our survey returns, are:
Private rental ..... 4.5% Tied to employment . 12.5% Council housing .... 15.0% Owner occupied ..... 68.0%
